pages.text: $(o)A ruined underground outpost, made almost entirely of $(l:minebound:items/myrial_steel_ingot)myrial steel blocks.$()$(o) Inside there are numerous $(l:minebound:myri/myri_corpse)dead my'ri$()$(o), insinuating a bloodbath. The question is: who killed them? If you had to guess, the most likely answer is other my'ri. Perhaps the race isn't as unified as one would expect.
$(o)A grave for them, but a wealth of resources for you.
